Changelog
=========

1.7.1 (2011/03/10)
------------------
* Changed default view of folder deepening. Now it has the usually folder's views [micecchi]

1.7.0 (2010/11/12)
------------------

* Links to file now show file size, and directly download them [micecchi]

1.6.0 (2010/10/22)
------------------

* first public release
